pullrequest.title: Expose API to support adding items to model editor palette

content.raw:
Actually I am currently using this for mentor2 to add a wire button that allows users to connect two components together. The mouse interaction is handed in the mentor2 gui plugin so I didn't need `ModelCreator` but you're right later on I need to add hooks in `ModelCreator` in order to add other links, and find a way to handle selections. I will address that separately

Yes, with this API the users will be able to add any widget to the palette - just like how they can currently add any thing to our main window too if they want..
content.html:
Actually I am currently using this for mentor2 to add a wire button that allows users to connect two components together. The mouse interaction is handed in the mentor2 gui plugin so I didn't need ModelCreator but you're right later on I need to add hooks in ModelCreator in order to add other links, and find a way to handle selections. I will address that separately

Yes, with this API the users will be able to add any widget to the palette - just like how they can currently add any thing to our main window too if they want..
